scripts.dev: concurrently -k "vite" "tsc -p tsconfig.node.json -w" "wait-on dist/electron/main.js && node scripts/ensure-electron-module.cjs && cross-env VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 electron dist/electron/main.js"
scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.node.json && node scripts/ensure-electron-module.cjs && vite build
scripts.start: node scripts/ensure-electron-module.cjs && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron dist/electron/main.js
